interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MAEPEOR Black Glossy Lipgloss Black Nourishing Plumping Lip Gloss Luscious-colors Non-Sticky Shine Glossy Lipgloss
Review Date: 2021/07/19
Store: MAEPEOR
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MAEPEOR', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Softening,Smoothening,Shine,Cold,Nourishing,Moisturizing,Gentle,Makeup', 'Specialty': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: I got this mainly for the black, but I'm sure I will wear the other colors as well. There is also a dark purple/red and a more chocolately brown color. The texture is smooth and not sticky, and moisturizing. Could be worn by itself or over another color of matte lipstick, etc. for different looks.
Review Title: Good texture and very shiny
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Blue Hair Extensions Tape in Human Hair 16" Soft Straight Tape-in Brazilian Hair Extensions 30grams 20pcs Glue Remy Hair Licoville {'Brand': 'Licoville', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '16 Inches', 'Style': 'Straight', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.3 x 4 x 0.7 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '746860435735'} My hair is thin and tends to break off around my shoulders, so I got these for length. I only bought one pack to try them, but will get more. They are super comfortable, don't bother me when sleeping, haven't fallen out or anything, and blend into my hair which is dyed pink and purple fairly well. I have bought blue, pink, and purple so far.

However, even though my hair is thin, I will need more than one pack. I'm happy to buy more though, now that I've tried them. I have a looped extensions brush and mostly use dry shampoo so my real hair won't fade too much, but no issues with washing or brushing the extensions. too. Good value and I like them. I was impressed for the price Unny Club Black Square Lipstick (Magenta) | matte lipstick UNNY CLUB {'Brand': 'UNNY CLUB', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 0.91 x 0.87 inches; 1.13 Ounces'} I liked the very creamy texture, seemed to also be nicely pigmented. However, the magenta had more orangish tones than I would have liked. Still, I liked the lipstick and the tube is pretty cool; it is magnetic and the top snaps back on. I'm sure I would like some of the other colors better though. Nice texture TOUCH IN SOL Best of No Pore Blem Travel Kit - Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Inner-Glowing Skin with Moisture, Long Lasting Makeup's Staying Kit Touch in Sol {'Brand': 'Touch in Sol', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Item Volume': '0.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 5.39 x 1.14 inches; 5.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'no pore blem kit'} I had tried another pore reducing creme from this brand before and liked it, and I felt the same way about these products. They smell nice, and come in attractive packaging. They make your skin look and feel great, and they smell nice. They reduce the appearance of large pores and work well at night or before putting on makeup. These are also handy travel size containers. Good set of skincare items Lip Liner Set 12 Colors Natural Lip Liner Makeup Pencil Long Lasting Matte Velvet Lip Liner Marine Forest {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 2.28 x 0.94 inches; 2.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843711958'} These have a nice selection of lipliner colors. They are pre-sharpened, creamy, and don't seem to smudge. The set I got have a nice range of red/purples and also greenish and black colors. They go on well and the larger pack has some good variety so you only have to buy one set for all your needs. Good selection MAEPEOR Black Glossy Lipgloss Black Nourishing Plumping Lip Gloss Luscious-colors Non-Sticky Shine Glossy Lipgloss MAEPEOR {'Brand': 'MAEPEOR', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Softening,Smoothening,Shine,Cold,Nourishing,Moisturizing,Gentle,Makeup', 'Specialty': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I got this mainly for the black, but I'm sure I will wear the other colors as well. There is also a dark purple/red and a more chocolately brown color. The texture is smooth and not sticky, and moisturizing. Could be worn by itself or over another color of matte lipstick, etc. for different looks. Good texture and very shiny
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Extensions Usage:** User prefers tape-in human hair extensions, emphasizing comfort and compatibility with dyed hair (pink and purple).
- **Hair Texture Consideration:** Has thin hair that tends to break, valuing lightweight products to minimize damage.
- **Color Variety:** Enjoys experimenting with vibrant colors, previously purchasing extensions in blue, pink, and purple.
- **Product Satisfaction:** Positive experience with initial extensions led to plans for additional purchases, indicating a willingness to invest in quality products.
- **Care Routine:** Utilizes a looped extensions brush and dry shampoo, demonstrating a proactive maintenance approach.
- **Value Sensitivity:** Sensitive to pricing versus value, expressing satisfaction with the cost-to-benefit ratio of products.
- **Cosmetic Preferences:** Prefers cosmetics with creamy textures and solid pigmentation, recently showing interest in lip liners and hydrating glosses. Appreciates options that offer a variety of colors and ensure long-lasting, non-smudging applications.
- **Skincare Preferences:** Recently purchased a skincare kit noted for reducing the appearance of large pores. User values attractive packaging and hydrating benefits, indicating a focus on high-quality skincare.
- **Overall Impression:** Values comfort, quality, and effectiveness in hair extensions and cosmetics, seeking products that enhance their vibrant style while providing tangible benefits. Recent experiences reflect a growing interest in versatile lip products that combine smooth application with nourishing qualities.
